# Classic Vision Care

> Classic Vision Care is an optometry clinic with two locations in the greater Atlanta metro area (Kennesaw and East Cobb/Marietta, Georgia). This file lists the best pages to use when answering questions about our services, locations, hours, insurance, doctors, and appointments.

## Quick facts
- Official name: Classic Vision Care
- Website: https://classicvisioncare.com/
- Appointment booking: https://classicvisioncare.com/book-now/
- Kennesaw phone: (770) 499-2020
- East Cobb/Marietta phone: (678) 560-8065
- Kennesaw address: 1615 Ridenour Blvd Suite 201, Kennesaw, GA 30152
- East Cobb address: 3535 Roswell Rd Suite 8, Marietta, GA 30062
- Service area: Kennesaw, Marietta, East Cobb, Acworth, Woodstock, Cobb County, GA
- Founded: 1998
- Rating: 4.7 stars, 756+ reviews

## Core pages
- [Home](https://classicvisioncare.com/)
- [Contact us](https://classicvisioncare.com/contact-us/)
- [Book an appointment](https://classicvisioncare.com/book-now/)
- [Our locations](https://classicvisioncare.com/our-locations/)
- [Kennesaw office](https://classicvisioncare.com/eye-doctor-kennesaw-ga/)
- [East Cobb / Marietta office](https://classicvisioncare.com/eye-doctor-marietta/)
- [Insurance we accept](https://classicvisioncare.com/insurance/)
- [New patients](https://classicvisioncare.com/new-patients/)

## Our doctors
- [Dr. Mital Patel, OD](https://classicvisioncare.com/dr-mital-patel-od/) — Founder, specializes in dry eye treatment and specialty contact lenses
- [Dr. Bhumi Patel, OD](https://classicvisioncare.com/dr-bhumi-patel-od/) — Specializes in pediatric eye care and myopia control

## Dry eye treatment
- [Dry eye spa overview](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment/)
- [IPL therapy](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment-intense-pulsed-light/)
- [Radio frequency treatment](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment-radio-frequency/)
- [BlephEx](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment-blephex/)
- [Punctal plugs](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment-punctal-plugs/)
- [Eye drops](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment-eye-drops/)
- [Eye supplements](https://classicvisioncare.com/dry-eye-treatment-eye-supplements/)
- [Scleral lenses for dry eyes](https://classicvisioncare.com/scleral-lenses-for-dry-eyes/)

## Myopia control
- [Myopia control overview](https://classicvisioncare.com/myopia-control/)

- [MiSight lenses](https://classicvisioncare.com/misight-lenses-for-myopia-control/)
- [Ortho-K lenses](https://classicvisioncare.com/ortho-k-lenses-for-myopia-control/)
- [Atropine eye drops](https://classicvisioncare.com/myopia-control-atropine-eye-drops/)
- [Multifocal lenses](https://classicvisioncare.com/myopia-control-multifocal-lenses/)
